law.catch_line: There is created, as part of the State Library Resource Center at the Enoch Pratt Free Library, a St...

text.section: There is created, as part of the State Library Resource Center at the Enoch Pratt Free Library, a State Publications Depository and Distribution Program.
The Administrator of the Program shall be appointed by the Director of the State Library Resource Center.
Funding for the Program shall be provided in the aid to education budget of the State Board of Education in a program entitled State Publications Depository.
